com.github.dexecutor.core.task

Class Task<T,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dexecutor.core.task.Task<T,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of Node/Task ID
    R - Type of Node/Task result
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class Task<T,R>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represent a unit of execution in Dexecutor framework
    Author:
    Nadeem Mohammad
